text: Nocardiopsis alkaliphila is an alkaliphilic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from soil from Egypt.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Nocardiopsis alkaliphila produces nocardiopyrone A, nocardiopyrone B and pyridinols. == References == == Further reading == * == External links == *Type strain of Nocardiopsis alkaliphila at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2004
title: Nocardiopsis alkaliphila
